001package io.cyborgcode.roa.api.config;
002
003import io.cyborgcode.roa.api.allure.RestClientAllureImpl;
004import io.cyborgcode.roa.api.allure.RestResponseValidatorAllureImpl;
005import io.cyborgcode.roa.api.client.RestClient;
006import io.cyborgcode.roa.api.validator.RestResponseValidator;
007import org.springframework.context.annotation.Bean;
008import org.springframework.context.annotation.ComponentScan;
009import org.springframework.context.annotation.Configuration;
010import org.springframework.context.annotation.Primary;
011
012/**
013 * Configures the API test framework components.
014 *
015 * <p>This class defines Spring beans for core API testing components, including
016 * the {@link RestClient} and {@link RestResponseValidator}, with Allure-enabled implementations.
017 *
018 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
019 */
020@Configuration
021@ComponentScan(basePackages = {"io.cyborgcode.roa.api"})
022public class ApiTestFrameworkAutoConfiguration {
023
024   /**
025    * Provides a primary bean for REST API interactions.
026    *
027    * @param restClientAllure The Allure-integrated REST client.
028    * @return The configured {@link RestClient}.
029    */
030   @Bean
031   @Primary
032   public RestClient restClient(RestClientAllureImpl restClientAllure) {
033      return restClientAllure;
034   }
035
036   /**
037    * Provides a primary bean for API response validation.
038    *
039    * @param restResponseValidator The Allure-integrated response validator.
040    * @return The configured {@link RestResponseValidator}.
041    */
042   @Bean
043   @Primary
044   public RestResponseValidator restResponseValidator(RestResponseValidatorAllureImpl restResponseValidator) {
045      return restResponseValidator;
046   }
047
048}
